Question
========
If age - which is a continuous variable - has a significantly negative
moderation effect on the effect of hours of training on sports
performance, then for whom (i.e. people of which age) is the effect of
hours of training on sports performance the strongest?

Answerlist
----------
* The effect of training on performance does not vary with age
* Young people
* People with average age
* Older people

Solution
========





A negative moderation effect means that the interaction effect is
negative or, in other words, that the moderator M weakens the
relationship between X and Y. Therefore, the option Â 'Young people' is
correct.

* False
* True
* False
* False
